trans-unit.source: Provides methods to access services for tracking the loading state of a Web Forms document, handling events at load time, accessing a document's location, managing a document's undo service, and setting a new selection within the document.
Creates a discardable undo unit.
This method is obsolete and there is no equivalent functionality.
The new discardable undo unit.
Discards the specified undo unit.
This method is obsolete and there is no equivalent functionality.
The undo unit to discard.
Gets the URL at which the document is located.
The URL at which the document is located, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the document has no associated URL.
Enables the ability to undo actions that occur within undoable action units or transactions.
This method is obsolete and there is no equivalent functionality.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if actions should be undoable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the document service is currently loading.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the document service is loading; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the service has finished loading.
> [!NOTE] > The LoadComplete interface event is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.LoadComplete> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> class for equivalent designer functionality.
This event provides an opportunity to perform operations immediately after loading has completed.
Events that should occur at load time can be registered as event handlers for this event.
To be added.
When implemented in a derived class, updates the current selection.
This method is obsolete and there is no equivalent functionality.
